title: Error when viewing compile error box in development
body:
# Bug Report

## Problem

When I tap an error in the development environment (for example if Figwheel reports a compile error, which appears as a yellow box error) then the application crashes with the following error:

![Screenshot (11 Nov 2019 15_50_14)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/224635/68601010-65a55f00-049b-11ea-8f6e-00761eb6194f.png)


#### Expected behavior

The original error should be shown

#### Actual behavior

The application crashes

### Reproduction

Open the application and connect it to Figwheel, modify the source code such that there is a compile error and the Figwheel error appears in a yellow box. Then tap the yellow box. 

To be clear though, this happens with any error, reg or yello.


#### Logs


@alexjg the issue is still relevant for you?
Unfortunately I don't have time to work on Status at the moment, so not really. I never managed to solve the problem but you might as well close it if no one else is encountering it.
